revision.text: Possibly: The preceptor : containing a general course of education. Wherein the first principles of polite learning are laid down in a way most suitable for trying the genius, and advancing the instruction of youth. In twelve parts. (Dublin : Printed by George Faulkner, 1749.) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/83285966
